Carlos Gomez.description: taking a break to go for a walk in nature or visit a local art gallery (taking notes and jotting down any poetic inspiration) @ the Ville:artist's co-living space:common room:common room table

Klaus Mueller.description: attending a lecture (finding a seat in the lecture hall) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:classroom:classroom student seating

Sam Moore.description: conversing about how to incorporate elements from different cultures into their collaboration project to make it more diverse and inclusive. @ <persona> Eddy Lin
chat: Eddy Lin
Hey Sam, how's the committee meeting going?
Sam Moore
Hey Eddy, the committee meeting is going well. I wanted to discuss our collaboration project further. Do you have time to chat about it?
Eddy Lin
Sure, I have some time now. Let's discuss our collaboration project further.
Sam Moore
I was thinking we could look into incorporating more elements from other cultures to make our project more diverse and inclusive. What are your thoughts on that?
Eddy Lin
That sounds like a great idea, Sam! I agree that incorporating elements from other cultures can make our project more diverse and inclusive. I think we should definitely explore those possibilities.
Sam Moore
I agree, let's brainstorm some ideas on how we can incorporate elements from different cultures into our project.
Eddy Lin
I think we should start by researching traditional music and art forms from various cultures that we can incorporate into our project.
Sam Moore
I'll start looking into traditional African music and spoken word elements for inspiration. Let's reconvene next week to discuss our findings.
Eddy Lin
I'll focus on researching jazz and hip-hop music influences for our project. Let's combine our findings next week.
Sam Moore
Let's also consider incorporating elements from Asian cultures into our project to further enhance its diversity and inclusivity.
Eddy Lin
Hey Sam, I think considering elements from Asian cultures is a great idea to enhance the diversity and inclusivity of our project.

Ayesha Khan.description: researching for her senior thesis at the library (referencing other scholarly articles for her thesis) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
